(0,): As a Developer, I want to update validation rules, so that I can ensure the system adheres to the latest requirements As a UI Designer, I want to redesign the Resources page, so that it aligns with the new Broker design styles As a UI Designer, I want to report user testing feedback to Agencies, so that they can improve the system based on user experiences As a UI Designer, I want to move on to the next round of edits, so that I can continue refining the design of pages in the project
(2,): As a Developer, I want to manage D Files generation requests, so that I can efficiently cache and handle data processing tasks As a Developer, I want to clarify error triggers, so that I can assist users in understanding issues they encounter As a Broker User, I want to upload and validate files, so that I can ensure the data I provide is correct and meets system standards As a Broker User, I want to generate a D1 file synced with FPDS data load, so that I can maintain accurate records As a System, I want to process deletions for a specified date, so that the database can remain clean and organized
(1,): As a FABS User, I want to submit FABS data, so that I can contribute to the federal award data system As a FABS User, I want to download uploaded FABS files, so that I can review or use the data that has been submitted As a Data User, I want to receive updates to FABS records, so that I can stay informed about changes that affect my data
